name: No way out (itch) (Urvish07)
description:
HI

I am young new game dev, I am just 14, I have tried to make a first person game, I have worked hard on this game. Please download and play this game. It may not be that good game or it may be fully bad but please once try, I would really appreciate that.

please play and leave feedback and rating I would really appreciate  that

I HOPE YOU ENJOY.... :)

THANK YOU.... :)
